Mpaghara atọ 6 bụ ọwa egwu Ghana nke ga-ewe awa 24 site na Mpaghara Three 6 Network Limited
Ha na-elekwasị anya n'ịchịkọta egwu na itinye ndị ntorobịa na mkparịta ụka mmekọrịta
Ha bụ ọtụtụ ụdị, netwọkụ n'ikpo okwu nke na-enye akụkọ egwu na-emebi emebi, vidiyo, ajụjụ ọnụ ndị nka, mmemme pụrụiche, na mmemme izizi na nyiwe dijitalụ Ghana.
Mpaghara nke atọ 6 gosipụtara ihe omume mbụ ya na 13 Ọktoba 2013 na GHOne TV, dị ka ihe ngosi telivishọn nke nkeji iri atọ na isii.
Ha na-akwado ndị ntorobịa, na-azụlite ihe okike ha ma na-eguzo maka nsogbu ha kwenyere na ya site na iji egwu ndị ntorobịa na-emepụta.

Mpaghara nke Atọ 6 nọchitere anya Ghana na nyiwe abụọ dị ka Channel O Music Video Awards 2014, MTV Africa Music Awards 15 & 16, IARA 2017, One Africa Music Festival 2017 na 18 na United Kingdom, New York na Dubai.
Na June 2021, Mpaghara atọ 6 malitere igosi dị ka ọwa satellite n'efu nke ndị ọrụ na Ghana, akụkụ nke West Africa, Eshia na Middle East.
